patthana13.7:5.1: Pītisahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca napītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.7:5.2: Pītisahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.7:5.3: Pītisahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.7:5.4: Pītisahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca napītisahagato ca naupekkhāsahagato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.7:5.5: Pītisahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhasahagato ca naupekkhāsahagato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.7:5.6: Pītisahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca napītisahagato ca nasukhasahagato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.7:5.7: Pītisahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca napītisahagato ca nasukhasahagato ca naupekkhāsahagato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #7
patthana13.7:6.1: Sukhasahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pe … satta.
patthana13.7:7.1: Upekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pe … satta.
patthana13.7:8.1: Pītisahagatañca sukhasahagatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca napītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pe … satta.
patthana13.7:9.1: Hetuyā aṭṭhavīsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa … pe … avigate aṭṭhavīsa.
